conclusion: Given data: Magnetic induction intensity B=0.1 T, number of turns n=100, side lengths l_AB=0.2 m and l_BC=0.5 m, angular velocity ω=100π rad/s.
Calculate the area of the coil: A=l_AB×l_BC=0.2 m×0.5 m=0.1 m².
The maximum induced electromotive force in the coil is given by the formula E_m=nBAω.
Substitute the given values into the formula: E_m=100×0.1 T×0.1 m²×100π rad/s.
The magnitude of the induced electromotive force in the coil is 100π V.
